experiment_name: Enantiodivergent Radical Alkylation by Synergistic Lewis-Acid-Enzyme and Photoredox Catalysis
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:room temperature;    reaction_ph:8.0;    reaction_other_conditions:3 mol% enzyme, 6 mol% CuSO4, 2 mol% Ru(bpy)3Cl2, 8% v/v DMSO, N2 atmosphere, 450-460 nm LEDs illumination, 12 h reaction time, total volume 0.8 mL;    reaction_substrate_concentration:5 mM
